poem:
**Parliament of Despair**

In the grey halls,
echoes of hope
flicker, fragile as morning light –
five voices rise,
independent and whole,
cutting through
the fog 
of old power.

Here, in the rubble
of promises,
a new song
whispers.

Holdfast, 
it says,
to the heart
of the people.
